tool_description: This API helps to query properties for sale, rent, sold,etcâ€¦ in Australia to create a realtor, real estate site/application such as realestate.com.au
title: Realty in AU

api_list.name: schools/list
api_list.description: List schools around a GEO location

api_list.name: properties/list
api_list.description: List properties with options and filters

required_parameters.name: searchLocation
required_parameters.description: The value of text field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

required_parameters.name: searchLocationSubtext
required_parameters.description: The value of subtext field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The value of region field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description: Facilities you are looking for. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : pool,garage,etc...

optional_parameters.name: propertyTypes
optional_parameters.description: Ignore or one of the following : townhouse|unit apartment|retire|acreage|land|unitblock|house|villa|rural. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : townhouse,house,villa

optional_parameters.name: constructionStatus
optional_parameters.description: Ignore or one of the following : established|new

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of items returned per response. For paging purpose (max is 30)

api_list.name: properties/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a property

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of 'listingId' field returned in .../properties/list endpoint or 'id' field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with type as listing

api_list.name: properties/lookup (Deprecating)
api_list.description:
Look for off-market property by id
* Use .../properties/v2/lookup endpoint instead for more data returned.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of 'id' field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with display as 'Property history'

api_list.name: properties/v2/lookup
api_list.description: Look for off-market property by id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of 'id' field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with display as 'Property history'

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestions by term or phrase. The returned data will be used with .../properties/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase you are familiar with. It can be an address to get the property id directly to use with .../properties/detail endpoint.
